title: As a user I want to be able to search for Investigations
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is in advance search tab
custom_steps: WHEN user select 'Investigation' under Advanced Search
custom_expected:
THEN the available filters should match the requirements. 
AND the columns displayed should match the requirements. 
AND The "Date" column should be hyperlink to the Investigation form for BOC users only.
AND the player's name should be a hyperlink to their profile.

title: Investigation Form - Permissions
custom_steps:
Acceptance Criteria: 
* The form has a view only permission set that can be added to an existing user if needed. Users with this permission can view all aspects of the form, but cannot edit anything.  Users without the permission cannot view the form anywhere in the system.
* The form has a "registration" permission set that can be added to an existing user if needed. Users with this permission can view all aspects of the form, but can only edit/create Investigations with a type = Registration. Users without this permission or the admin permission cannot edit or create Investigations anywhere in the system. 
* The form has an admin permission set that can be added to an existing user if needed. Users with this permission can view all aspects of the form, and can edit/create any Investigation type. Users without this permission cannot edit or create non-Registration Investigations anywhere in the system. 

*Please include the delivery of the new LDAPs as part of this delivery*
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/EBIS+2+Roles+to+LDAP+Mapping
custom_expected: https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/138391269

title: As a Club user I want to be prevented from creating a request for a player my org has a current pending request for
custom_preconds: GIVEN the Club's ORG already has a current pending Investigation request for a player in a Preliminary, Submitted or Update Needed state
custom_steps:
WHEN Club attempts to create a new request for the player 
AND selects "Investigation Request"
custom_expected:
THEN an error will display. 
Error Message: 
Your Organization already has a Preliminary or Submitted request for this player. You may not submit another request until the existing request has been reviewed. Please contact the BOC for more information.
AND The only available button should be "Back". Clicking this will return the user to the point of entry.

title: As a user I want to see current status display in different colors on an Investigation Request depending on the status
custom_preconds: GIVEN a player's Investigation Request has Preliminary, Approved, Rejected or other status
custom_steps: When user is viewing the investigation request form
custom_expected:
THEN the color of current status should meet the following criteria: 
- For preliminary color should be red(#d42307) 
- For approved or rejected use black
- For anything else use green (#00a651)

title: As a BOC user I want to be able to create a new Investigation
custom_preconds: GIVEN a BOC user logs in
custom_steps:
WHEN the user clicks Create New menu for professional, domestic amateur and international amateur players
AND selects Investigation
custom_expected:
THEN a new Investigation form is opened for the player. 
AND the Investigation Form matches the wireframe and data discovery. (http://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=investigation_form)

title: As a BOC user I want to be able to save a new Investigation
custom_preconds: GIVEN a BOC user logs in
custom_steps: When the user is viewing a new Investigation Form
custom_expected:
THEN "Save" and "Cancel" will be available.
AND Clicking "Save" will conduct a required field and format check according to the data discovery,  will save the form and throw a blue successful save notification. 
AND Clicking "Cancel" will ask the user if they are sure they would like to cancel - if they confirm nothing is saved and the user is returned to the point of entry.

title: As a user I want the text in the attached files section to show accurate information about what documents are required
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is trying to open an investigation request for a player
custom_steps: WHEN the user is on the Investigation request form under 'Attached File(s)'
custom_expected:
THEN if a player's home country IS the Dominican Republic show the following text:
**"In order to request an investigation, you must upload a completed investigation form, the player's birth certificate, a color headshot, the applicable consent form, the mother's ID, and the father's ID."**

OR If a player's home country IS NOT the Dominican Republic show the following text:
**"In order to request an investigation, you must upload a completed investigation form, the player's birth certificate, a color headshot, the applicable consent form, The player's ID, the mother's ID, and the father's ID."**

title: As a user I want saving a new grandfathered player profile to send the profile information to LARI
custom_preconds: GIVEN a new grandfathered player is created, or edited an existing grandfathered player
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks saves
custom_expected:
THEN the system should send the player information updates to LARI using the REST API. 
AND for exact fields and methods of communication view documentation found here:https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/4.1+Profile+fields

title: As a user I want saving a new investigation to send the player profile information to LARI
custom_preconds: GIVEN a new investigation has been created for a player
custom_steps: WHEN the investigation is saved
custom_expected:
THEN  the player's profile information is sent to LARI. If the profile had previously been sent to LARI it is sent as a "player update".
AND fields and methods of communication should follow documentation found here:https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/4.1+Profile+fields

title: As a user I want profile updates on profiles that have been sent to LARI to a registration profile to be sent to LARI
custom_preconds: GIVEN a player profile has been previously sent to LARI
custom_steps: WHEN one or more fields updated that are typically sent to LARI
custom_expected: THEN the updates should be sent to LARI as a player update.

title: As a BOC user I want to be able to edit an existing Investigation (converted from 1)
custom_preconds: GIVEN a BOC user logs in
custom_steps: When the user is viewing an existing Investigation Form
custom_expected:
THEN an "Edit" button will be available. 
AND Clicking "Edit" will place the form into edit mode with the fields editable per the data discovery 
AND "Save" and "Cancel" buttons will be available. 
AND Clicking "Save" will conduct a required field and format check according to the data discovery,  will save the form and throw a blue successful save notification. 
AND Clicking "Cancel" will ask the user if they are sure they would like to cancel - if they confirm nothing is saved and the user is returned to the point of entry.

title: As a BOC user I want to be able to edit an existing Investigation (new in 2)
custom_preconds: GIVEN a BOC user logs in
custom_steps: When the user is viewing an existing Investigation Form
custom_expected:
THEN an "Edit" button will be available. 
AND Clicking "Edit" will place the form into edit mode with the fields editable per the data discovery 
AND "Save" and "Cancel" buttons will be available. 
AND Clicking "Save" will conduct a required field and format check according to the data discovery, will save the form and throw a blue successful save notification. 
AND Clicking "Cancel" will ask the user if they are sure they would like to cancel - if they confirm nothing is saved and the user is returned to the point of entry.

title: As a BOC user I want an Investigation to automatically be linked to an existing Minor Contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN BOC user logs in
custom_steps: WHEN an Investigation is first created by the user
custom_expected:
THEN the system should locate any contracts in the system for the player with a status of "Terms Submitted" or "Terms Accepted". If one exists, then this contract should be pre-populated in the Contract ID field of the Investigation Form.
Or If no "Terms Submitted" or "Terms Accepted" contracts exist for the player then the system should check for any Approved contracts - if one exists then the contract with the latest Approval stamp should be pre-populated in the Contract ID field of the Investigation Form. 
AND The "Signing Bonus" field should be prepopulated with the signing bonus from the linked contract if no value has been entered. 
AND The "Org" field on the Investigation should be prepopulated with the Signing Org from the contract. If a different Org has already been selected, this Org should be added.

title: As a BOC user I want to be able to link an Investigation to a Contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN BOC user logs in
custom_steps: WHEN user opens an investigation form in edit more
custom_expected:
THEN users should see a "Select" button associated with the Contract ID field (see wire). 
OR If no contract exists for this player, the button should not display.
AND Clicking this button will launch a pop-up for the user to select the associated contract to link to this investigation (see 2nd wire). 
AND The popup will contain a complete list of the Major and Minor League Contracts that exist for this player. 
AND The Status of the Contract, Signing Org, Type and the Date Created will display. 
AND The Status will be a hyperlink to navigate the user to the contract. 
AND The user will only be able to select one contract to link. 
AND The button "Select" should be disabled until 1 contract is selected
AND Clicking "Select" will populate the Contract ID field with the ID of the selected contract. 
AND If a contract ID already existed in this field, it is overwritten. 
AND The "Signing Bonus" field should be prepopulated with the signing bonus from the linked contract if no value has been entered. 
AND The "Org" field on the Investigation should be prepopulated with the Signing Org from the contract. If a different Org has already been selected, this Org should be added.

title: As a user I want Review Committee information entered in LARI to be reflected in ebis
custom_steps:
Business Rules: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/4.+LARI+Integration

https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Data+Discovery+-+Investigation+Form

Acceptance Criteria: 
* When Review Committee information is entered in LARI, the investigation information should be communicated back to ebis according to the business rules and the data discovery of the Investigation Form.
custom_expected: https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/140465075

title: As a user I want investigation results entered in LARI to be reflected in ebis
custom_steps:
Business Rules: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/4.+LARI+Integration

https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Data+Discovery+-+Investigation+Form

Acceptance Criteria: 
* When investigation results are entered in LARI, the investigation information should be communicated back to ebis according to the business rules and the data discovery of the Investigation Form.
custom_expected: https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/140464589

title: As a user I want to see who submitted an Investigation Request on the form
custom_preconds: GIVEN User submitted an Investigation Request
custom_steps: WHEN user is on the Investigation Request form
custom_expected:
THEN Request Submitted field and a Submitted By field appear in the Status & Dates section of the Investigation Request. 
AND Request Submitted should be the date and time the request was submitted. (mm/dd/yyyy - hh:mm pm)
AND Submitted By should be populated with the username of the user that submitted the request.

title: As a user I want to see a Close button on an Investigation Request form
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user logs in
custom_steps: WHEN the user is viewing an Investigation Request in view mode
custom_expected:
THEN when viewing an Investigation Request in view mode, there should be a Close button.
AND Clicking the Close button will work the same as if the user had clicked their browser back button.

title: As a Club user I want to see Investigation Requests in my Pending Approvals widget
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club user submitted waiver request
AND has investigation editors role
custom_steps: WHEN user is on Pending Approvals Widget
custom_expected:
THEN Club users should see the submitted waiver request in their Pending Approvals widget.
AND it should match the BOC version of the Approvals item, including rolling off when the request is approved, rejected or sent for update.

title: As a user I want to see which files are required within the label dropdown
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user opens an investigation request form
And uploaded a file(s)
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on the label
custom_expected: THEN a red "*" will appear after the required document labels within the label dropdown.

title: As a user I want the correct status saved and displayed in a player's Investigation History and search results when an investigation is saved
custom_preconds: GIVEN Investigation with different status are created
custom_steps: WHEN user checks the Investigation History or search results for investigation in adv search
custom_expected:
THEN the Status displayed in the Investigation History for Investigations (not Requests) follows the following rules: 
       *Before the Investigation has been submitted for the first time the Investigation Status = Preliminary
       *When the Age Result and Identity Result = Pending or blank then the Investigation Status = Pending
       *When the Age Result and Identity Result = Waived then the Investigation Status = Waived 
       *When the Age Result OR Identity Result = Failed then the Investigation Status = Failed
       *When the Age Result AND Identity Result = Confirmed then the Investigation Status = Confirmed
       *When the Age Result OR Identity Result = Undetermined and the other result = Undetermined or Confirmed, then the Investigation Status = Undetermined

title: As a user I want to see Investigation Waiver Requests differently than Investigation Requests
custom_preconds: GIVEN user logs into the system
custom_steps: WHEN a Club submits an investigation waiver
custom_expected:
THEN the blue successful submit notification should indicate that an Investigation Waiver Request was submitted - not just an investigation request. 
AND the Approvals item, and corresponding Pending Approvals item, should say "Investigation Waiver Request" as the Type instead of Investigation Request. 
AND When a BOC user opens a submitted investigation waiver request, it should match the wireframe, instead of looking the same as a submitted waiver request. 
AND The Investigation Waiver Request should appear in the player's investigation history as an Investigation Waiver Request.

title: As a user I want a registration profile to be sent to LARI when the profile is elevated
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a new investigation has been created for a player
AND the associated Player Profile has not already been sent to LARI
custom_steps: WHEN the international amateur player is "Elevated"
custom_expected:
THEN the player profile should be sent to LARI
AND fields and methods of communication should follow documentation found here:https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/4.1+Profile+fields

title: As a user I want saving a new investigation to send the investigation information to LARI
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a new investigation has been created for a player
AND Age/ID results are NOT set to N/A
custom_steps: WHEN the investigation is saved
custom_expected:
THEN the investigation should be sent to LARI
AND fields and methods of communication should follow documentation found here:https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/4.1+Profile+fields

title: As a user I want certain Investigation results to be communicated back to LARI
custom_preconds: GIVEN an investigation has been created for a Player in ebis
custom_steps: WHEN the investigation result is updated in ebis to be "Waived"
custom_expected: THEN this result should be communicated back to LARI

title: As a user I want merging 2 International Player profiles to send the information to LARI
custom_preconds: GIVEN an International Player Profile has already been sent to LARI
custom_steps: WHEN the International Player Profile associated with a player ID a that has already been sent to LARI is merged with another International Player Profile
custom_expected:
THEN the information should be communicated to LARI. 
AND fields and methods of communication should follow documentation found here: https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/4.1+Profile+fields

title: As a user I only want to see Investigations in Search that I have permission to see (Created prior to EBIS2)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club user is logged in and attempting to Adv Search for an Investigation created prior to ebis2 implementation
AND club user is from requesting Club for the investigation they're searching for (The Org on the Investigation Form is their Org)
AND player on this investigation is currently under contract with user's org OR the player is a Free Agent
AND the investigation was entered on or after January 1, 2011.
custom_steps: WHEN user performs Adv Search
custom_expected:
THEN only Investigations that meet ALL of the above criteria should display
AND Investigations that do not meet ALL of the criteria above should not display

title: As a user I only want to see Investigations in Search that I have permission to see (Created in EBIS2)
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in and attempting to Adv Search for an Investigation created in ebis2
custom_steps: WHEN user performs Adv Search
custom_expected:
THEN Investigation visibility should be controlled by BOC Investigations users on the Investigation form itself
AND if Requesting Org is checked then any Org that has an approved investigation request for the selected investigation should be able to see the Investigation on the player's History
AND if Signing Org is checked, then the Org that the player is currently under contract with should be able to see the investigation on the player's History
AND if All Orgs is checked, then all Orgs should be able to see the investigation on the player's History
AND if BOC Only is checked, then only the BOC should be able to see the investigation on the player's History

title: As a user I want to be able to view a player's Contracts and Investigation History tab on the player profile
custom_preconds:
GIVEN "Contracts Tab" on player profile has been updated to indicate the presence of the Investigation History
AND a user is logged in as club or boc
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates player profile contracts tab
custom_expected:
THEN if the player has an Investigation History to display, then the user should see the tab as "Contracts & Inv"
AND if user is a BOC user and the player has at least one investigation request or investigation on file, then they should have an Investigation History displayed
AND if user is a club user and the player has at least one investigation on file OR a request from this Club, then they should have an Investigation History displayed
AND title attribute on the tab should be set to title="Contracts & Investigations" so hovering over the tab displays a browser tooltip

title: As a user I want to only see Investigations that I have permission to see within the player's Investigation History (updated for ebis2 investigations)
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in and attempting to view a player's Investigation History
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to Investigation History Table on Player Profile
custom_expected:
THEN Investigation requests should only be visible to the submitting Org, and BOC Investigations
AND Investigation visibility should be controlled by BOC Investigations users on the Investigation form itself
AND if Requesting Org is checked then any Org that has an approved investigation request for the selected investigation should be able to see the Investigation on the player's History
AND if Signing Org is checked, then the Org that the player is currently under contract with should be able to see the investigation on the player's History
AND if All Orgs is checked, then all Orgs should be able to see the investigation on the player's History
AND if BOC Only is checked, then only the BOC should be able to see the investigation on the player's History.

title: As a BOC user I want approving an investigation request to automatically create a new, preliminary Investigation for a player
custom_preconds: GIVEN an investigation request has been submitted to BOC
custom_steps: WHEN BOC user clicks "Approve" on the Investigation Request
custom_expected:
THEN the system should save any changes made to the request
AND system should mark the request as approved and display a successful approval notification
 AND system should close the request and open an Investigation Form for the player with the Final results for Age and ID set to Pending
 AND investigation Type and Org should be populated from the Request
 AND oif the Investigation Type = Contract then the Investigation Visibility should default to All Orgs
 BIUT if the Investigation Type = Pre-Contract, then the Investigation Visibility should default to Requesting Org(s)
 AND the Investigation Form should automatically be saved as preliminary
AND any Attached Files should be carried from the Request to the Form 
AND the player's Investigation History should be updated 
AND club should be notified of the approval
AND notification should state "Investigation Request Approved"

title: As a BOC user I want approving an investigation waiver request to automatically create a new, preliminary waived Investigation for a player
custom_preconds: GIVEN an investigation waiver request has been submitted to BOC
custom_steps: WHEN BOC user clicks "Approve" from the  Investigation Waiver Request
custom_expected:
THEN the system should save any changes made to the request
AND system should mark the waiver request as approved and display a successful approval notification
 AND system should remove the Approvals item for the BOC user
 AND system should close the waiver request and open an Investigation Form for the player for which the waiver was requested with the Final results for Age and ID set to Waived
 AND investigation Type and Org should be populated from the Request
 AND if the Investigation Type = Contract then the Investigation Visibility should default to All Orgs
 BUT if the Investigation Type = Pre-Contract, then the Investigation Visibility should default to Requesting Org(s)
 AND the Investigation Form should automatically be saved as preliminary
AND any Attached Files should be carried from the Request to the Form
 AND the player's Investigation History should be updated
 AND club should be notified of the approval
AND notification should state "Investigation Waiver Request Approved"

title: As a BOC user I want to have the option to link an investigation request to an existing investigation on approval of a request
custom_preconds: GIVEN an Investigation Request has been submitted to the BOC
custom_steps: WHEN BOC user reviews the Investigation Request
custom_expected:
THEN system should display only a standard "Approve" button if the player has no investigations in the system
BUT if the player has at least one investigation in the system, the user should see a split button that allows the BOC to choose whether or not they want to start a new Investigation, or add this request to an existing Investigation form
AND if the user clicks Approve - Create New, then the Investigation Request should be marked approved and the player should have a new investigation created as laid out in #139513527
BUT if the user clicks Approve - Add to Existing, then the system should do the following: 
 -System saves any changes that were made to the form. System marks the investigation request as approved and displays a successful approval notification. 
 - If only one investigation exists for the player then the system automatically adds the club who submitted the request as a requesting Org for the existing investigation. 
 - If more than one investigation exists in the system for the player - the system displays a pop-up prompting the user to select to which investigation to add the requesting Org.
 - If the visibility of the Investigation was set to include "Requesting Org" then the Org that submitted this request can now see the investigation in the Player's History. 
 - The player's Investigation History is updated. Club is notified of the approval of their request. See Clipboard #2.

title: As a user I want files attached to an Investigation Form to be communicated back to LARI
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an investigation has been created for a player and saved
AND user has opened the investigation form in edit mode
AND user has attached new files
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Save on the investigation form
custom_expected:
THEN system should check for the presence of any new attached files since the last save
AND system should send newly attached files to LARI
